name: Classic YouTube! 3.0
description: A userstyle to make YouTube a little more like how it was in the past! Now available as a userscript: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/161726 Features: - The YouTube logo has been changed to the classic logo. - Gray background! - Like and dislike buttons are more like the old ones! - Username looks more like it did before. (Credit to Hedja) - Guide is removed. (As it was useless) - Hides comment avatars (Credit to KleinerDosenpfand) - No G+ menu (Credit LabyStudio)
